00012 /**
00013  * default scaffolding-controller. extend it and use the hooks to costumize functionality
00014  * @package kata
00015  * @author mnt@codeninja.de
00016  */
00017 class ScaffoldController extends AppController {
00018 
00019              // hooks, overwrite them if you want
00020 
00021              function beforeDelete($id = null) {
00022                           return true;
00023              }
00024 
00025              function beforeUpdate($id = null) {
00026                           return true;
00027              }
00028 
00029              function beforeInsert($data = null) {
00030                           return true;
00031              }
00032 
00033              // the scaffolder
00034 
00035              function beforeAction() {
00036                           parent::beforeAction();
00037              }
00038              function beforeFilter() {
00039                           parent::beforeFilter();
00040              }
00041              function afterFilter() {
00042                           parent::afterFilter();
00043              }
00044 
00045              private $MyModel = null;
00046              private function findModelToScaffold() {
00047                           if (!is_array($this->uses) || (count($this->uses) == 0)) {
00048                                        throw new Exception('No Model to scaffold found');
00049                           }
00050 
00051                           $name = $this->uses[count($this->uses) - 1];
00052                           $this->MyModel = getModel($name);
00053              }
00054 
00055              final function index($page = 0) {
00056                           $this->layout = '../../lib/layouts/scaffold';
00057                           $this->findModelToScaffold();
00058                           $this->set('schema', $this->MyModel->describe());
00059                           $this->set('pages', $this->MyModel->readPageCount());
00060                           $this->set('page', $page);
00061                           $this->set('data', $this->MyModel->readPage($page));
00062                           $this->render('../../lib/scaffold/index');
00063              }
00064 
00065              final function delete($id = null, $page = 0) {
00066                           if (!$this->beforeDelete($id)) {
00067                                        return;
00068                           }
00069 
00070                           if (isset ($id) && is_numeric($id)) {
00071                                        $this->findModelToScaffold();
00072                                        $this->MyModel->delete($id);
00073                           }
00074                           $this->redirect($this->params['controller'] . '/index/' . (int) $page);
00075              }
00076 
00077              final function update($id = null) {
00078                           $this->layout = 'scaffold';
00079 
00080                           if (isset ($this->params['form']['id']) && is_numeric($this->params['form']['id'])) {
00081                                        if ($this->beforeUpdate($id)) {
00082                                                     $this->findModelToScaffold();
00083                                                     $schema = $this->MyModel->describe();
00084                                                     $data = $this->params['form']['data'];
00085                                                     $id = $data[$schema['primary']];
00086                                                     unset ($data[$schema['primary']]);
00087                                                     if ($this->MyModel->update($id, $data)) {
00088                                                                  $this->redirect('/' . $this->params['controller'] . '/index');
00089                                                                  return;
00090                                                     }
00091                                        }
00092                           }
00093 
00094                           if (isset ($id) && is_numeric($id)) {
00095                                        $this->findModelToScaffold();
00096                                        $this->set('update', $id);
00097                                        $this->set('schema', $this->MyModel->describe());
00098                                        $data = $this->MyModel->read($id);
00099                                        $this->set('data', array_shift($data));
00100                                        $this->set('formData', isset ($this->params['form']['data']) ? $this->params['form']['data'] : array ());
00101                                        $this->render('../../lib/scaffold/record');
00102                                        return;
00103                           }
00104 
00105                           $this->redirect($this->params['controller'] . '/index/');
00106              }
00107 
00108              final function insert() {
00109                           $this->layout = 'scaffold';
00110                           $this->set('update', 0);
00111 
00112                           if (isset ($this->params['form']['data']) && is_array($this->params['form']['data'])) {
00113                                        if ($this->beforeInsert($this->params['form']['data'])) {
00114                                                     $this->findModelToScaffold();
00115                                                     $schema = $this->MyModel->describe();
00116                                                     $data = $this->params['form']['data'];
00117                                                     $id = $data[$schema['primary']];
00118                                                     unset ($data[$schema['primary']]);
00119                                                     if ($this->MyModel->create($data)) {
00120                                                                  $this->redirect('/' . $this->params['controller'] . '/index');
00121                                                                  return;
00122                                                     }
00123                                        }
00124                           }
00125 
00126                           $this->findModelToScaffold();
00127                           $this->set('schema', $this->MyModel->describe());
00128                           $this->set('data', array ());
00129                           $this->set('formData', isset ($this->params['form']['data']) ? $this->params['form']['data'] : array ());
00130                           $this->render('../../lib/scaffold/record');
00131              }

00133 }
